T02D1364:183b-1: sha dam g-yo ga n'a ma /
T02D1364:183b-3: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1364:183b-4: gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1364:183b-5: de la 'dir thabs ni yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor te /
T02D1364:183b-6: 'dir bar ma rim pa las bzlog bas bstan cing
T02D1364:183b-7: nang gi yan lag re re dor ba snga ma
T02D1364:183b-8: ma bstan pa'i yan lag phyi ma bstan pa'i shugs
T02D1364:183b-9: nyid kyis rtogs par bya ste /
T02D1364:183b-10: dper na 'di ni nyin spyod ces brjod pas gzhan
T02D1364:183b-11: mtshan spyod ces bya ba ma brjod kyang shugs nyid
T02D1364:183b-12: kyis nye bar dmigs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1364:183b-13: de bzhin du yang gang zhig phan tshun ltos pa'i
T02D1364:183b-14: chos ni ma bstan pa yang bstan pa'i chos kyis
T02D1364:183b-16: de'i phyir rgyud 'dir yan lag re re'i khongs su gtogs pa'i yan lag gsum bstan to //
T02D1364:183b-17: bar du bshad pa'i yan lag dang por bya ba ni 'dir bla ma'i man ngag ste /
T02D1364:183b-18: gzhan du na gang gi tshe rgyud las gsungs pa'i
T02D1364:183b-19: rim pas gzung na ni de'i tshe bla ma'i man
T02D1364:183b-21: de'i phyir dgongs pas bshad pa la sogs pa thams
T02D1364:183b-22: cad bla ma'i man ngag las rtogs par bya ba
T02D1364:183b-23: 'am / yang na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
T02D1364:183b-24: mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las shes par bya ba yin
T02D1364:183b-25: gyi mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa rnams kyis
T02D1364:183b-26: byas pa de las ni ma yin no ;
T02D1364:183b-27: / des na bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pas yan lag gzhan gsum shes par bya'o //
T02D1364:183b-28: rgyud gzhan du yan lag drug gsungs pa 'dir mdor
T02D1364:183b-29: byas pa'i don gyis yan lag gsum du rtogs par
T02D1364:183b-30: bya ba ste / 'dir gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las /
T02D1364:183b-31: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02D1364:184a-0: @184a * // srog dang rtsol dang 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1364:184a-1: rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te //
T02D1364:184a-4: des na bsam gtan gyi sngon du 'gro ba ni so sor sdud pa'o //
T02D1364:184a-5: sngags bzlas pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni srog dang rtsol ba ste /
T02D1364:184a-6: 'dir sngags bzlas pa'i sgras ni ma ning gi bzlas pa'am /
T02D1364:184a-8: srog gi rlung 'dzin par brjod do //
T02D1364:184a-9: bde ba'i sngon du 'gro ba ni rjes su dran pa ste /
T02D1364:184a-10: de la bde ba'i sgras ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02D1364:184a-11: de ltar na yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor ba
T02D1364:184a-12: nyid ni sangs rgyas nyid du drug 'grub par 'gyur
T02D1364:184a-13: ro // tha mal pa'i phyi'i 'jig rten pa'i rnal
T02D1364:184a-14: 'byor grub pa ni las dang po pa'i byis pa'i
T02D1364:184a-15: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis sngags bzlas pa dang bsam
T02D1364:184a-16: ro // gtan gyis te / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1364:184a-17: lo brtags pa'i bsgom pa'i sems dang bde ba ni
T02D1364:184a-18: las kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya
T02D1364:184a-19: las byung ba'i 'jig rten pa'i bde ba dang /
T02D1364:184a-20: 'bab pa'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba 'jig rten pa'i
T02D1364:184a-21: bde bas ni 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi
T02D1364:184a-23: de ltar rim pa gnyis kyis 'jig rten pa dang
T02D1364:184a-24: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnal 'byor ba nyid 'grub
T02D1364:184a-26: rnal 'byor ba nyid mchog gi yan lag drug gi
T02D1364:184a-27: sbyor bas 'grub pa ji lta ba de bzhin du
T02D1364:184a-29: 'di so sor sdud pa ni phyi'i gzugs la sogs
T02D1364:184a-30: pa'i yul rnams la mig la sogs pa'i rnam par
T02D1364:184a-32: nang ki yul rnams la lha'i mig la sogs pa'i
T02D1364:184a-33: dbang po rnams kyi rnam par shes pa 'jug pa
T02D1364:184a-34: ste // nang gi ni chos thams cad stong pa
T02D1364:184a-35: nyid kyi dmigs pa rnam par ma brtags par mthong
T02D1364:184a-36: ba ni dngos po thams cad mthong ba stong pa
T02D1364:184a-37: ste // nyid kyis te / ji ltar bu mos
T02D1364:184a-38: gzugs brnyan mthong ba ltar khams gsum pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1364:184a-39: kyi gzugs brnyan mthong ba ni so sor sdud pa
T02D1364:184a-40: zhes bya ba yan lag dang po'o //
T02D1364:184a-41: de nas bsam gtan ni dngos po yod pa thams
T02D1364:184a-42: cad kyi stong pa shes rab tu 'dus pa la
T02D1364:184a-44: rtog pa zhes bya ba ni sems kyi dngos po'i don 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1364:184a-45: dpyod pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i khyad par 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1364:184a-46: dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad la sems gnas pa'o //
T02D1364:184b-0: bde ba ni dngos po thams cad kyi mi g-yo ba'i phung @184b sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1364:184b-1: de ltar bsam gtan gyi yan lag lnga bstan to //
T02D1364:184b-2: de nas srog dang rtsol ba zhes bya ba ni la la n'a dang /
T02D1364:184b-3: ra sa n'a ste g-yas pa dang g-yon pa 'gags
T02D1364:184b-4: shing aa ba dh'u t'i ra thim ste dbus kyi
T02D1364:184b-5: lam du srog gi rlung rtag tu 'jug pa'o //
T02D1364:184b-8: 'byung ba'i sbyor bas aa ba dh'u t'ir aom gyis 'jug pa dang /
T02D1364:184b-13: nyi ma'i rang bzhin gyis gams [*'gams?] par byed pa
T02D1364:184b-14: ni srog dang rtsol ba'i rang bzhin du bstan to
T02D1364:184b-15: // de nas 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung lte ba dang /
T02D1364:184b-21: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams su 'jug pas thig le
T02D1364:184b-22: la srog gnas shing phyir mi 'byung ba ni 'dzin
T02D1364:184b-23: pa'i yan lag tu bstan to //
T02D1364:184b-24: de nas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1364:184b-25: rang dad pa'i lha'i gzugs brnyan mthong bas rnam par
T02D1364:184b-27: de las 'od zer du ma 'phro ba'i gzugs can
T02D1364:184b-28: rab tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi tshul
T02D1364:184b-29: can khams gsum du spro ba de rjes su dran
T02D1364:184b-31: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rang dad pa'i
T02D1364:184b-32: lha la rjes su chags shing mi 'jigs pa'i bde
T02D1364:184b-33: ba / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med par sems
T02D1364:184b-34: rtse gcig pa yin no zhes ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D1364:184b-35: yan lag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so //
T02D1364:184b-36: 'dir yan lag drug ni rnal 'byor mdor gsungs pa ste rgyas par ni 'bum sde'am /
T02D1364:184b-38: bla ma'i man ngag las phyag rgya chen po'i dngos
T02D1364:184b-39: grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas khong du chud par
T02D1364:184b-40: bya'o // 'dir yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor dang
T02D1364:184b-41: po'i lam du bsgom pa'i man ngag bstan pa rgyud
T02D1364:184b-42: gzhan rnams su gsungs pa ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i
T02D1364:184b-43: rgyud phyi ma las bsnyen pa dang /
T02D1364:184b-46: sgrub pa chen po rnams te /
T02D1364:184b-48: bsnyen dus gtsug tor chen po yi //
T02D1364:184b-49: gzugs su 'bad pas bsgom par bya //
T02D1364:184b-50: nye sgrub dus su de bzhin du //
T02D1364:184b-51: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs bsgom bya //
T02D1364:184b-52: sgrub pa la ni lha yi gzugs //
T02D1364:184b-53: rnal 'byor brtson pas bsgom par bya //
T02D1364:184b-54: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag gzugs nyid ni //
T02D1364:184b-55: sgrub pa che la rnam par brtag / ces gsungs te /
T02D1364:185a-0: 'dir dgongs pa'i tshig gzhan gyis gtsug tor chen po'i gzugs ni khams gsum @185a * //
T02D1364:185a-1: ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku nam mkha' chos
T02D1364:185a-2: 'byung bar thugs rje rab tu gzhag cing bsnyen pa'i
T02D1364:185a-3: dus dang por so sor sdud pas sgom zhing bsam
T02D1364:185a-4: gtan gyi yan lag gis kyang brtan par bya'o //
T02D1364:185a-5: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dam bca' ba ni /
T02D1364:185a-6: rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs te //
T02D1364:185a-7: nyin zhag gcig la rnam par brtag / gal te rtags ni ma byung na //
T02D1364:185a-8: de tshe nga yi tshig brdzun yin //
T02D1364:185a-9: de la rtags ni du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D1364:185a-10: gzhan du sngags la sogs pas ma yin no //
T02D1364:185a-11: zhan gcig la sgrub pa gang gis sngags pa la rtags 'byung ste /
T02D1364:185a-12: de'i phyir sngags pas yod pa dang med pa'i blo
T02D1364:185a-13: spangs nas ltos pa med par byas la zab cing
T02D1364:185a-14: mi dmigs pa'i stong pa nyid las du ba la
T02D1364:185a-15: sogs pa'i rtags rnams 'byung ba de dag bsgom zhes
T02D1364:185a-16: bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1364:185a-17: byed dang bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1364:185a-18: sa gsum po ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D1364:185a-19: zhes bya ba las gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku
T02D1364:185a-20: mig la sogs pa'i byed pa rnams kyis bsgrub par
T02D1364:185a-21: bya'o // de nyid kyi man ngag ni /
T02D1364:185a-22: zhal las khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D1364:185a-23: de la bla ma'i man ngag gis rnal 'byor bas
T02D1364:185a-24: dang por nam mkha' la du ba lta bu mthong
T02D1364:185a-25: ste smig rgyu ni ma yin zhes rang gis nyams
T02D1364:185a-26: su myong bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1364:185a-27: de nas smig rgyu lta bu ste ;
T02D1364:185a-28: du ba la sogs pa de nyid rtog pa med par gzugs brnyan bzhin du'o //
T02D1364:185a-29: dang po du ba lta bu dang /
T02D1364:185a-30: gnyis pa smig rgyu lta bu dang /
T02D1364:185a-31: gsum pa nam mkha' lta bu dang /
T02D1364:185a-32: bzhi pa mar me lta bu dang /
T02D1364:185a-33: lnga pa sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu'i rtags gsang ba 'dus pa dang /
T02D1364:185a-34: mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba las gsungs so //
T02D1364:185a-35: gzhan yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba las /
T02D1364:185a-37: sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam pa dang //
T02D1364:185a-38: skad cig rmi lam lta bu'i rjes //
T02D1364:185a-39: de ni kun mkhyen rgyu yin te //
T02D1364:185a-40: dngos grub nye bar ster byed pa'o //
T02D1364:185a-42: des na bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las dang po
T02D1364:185a-43: du ba lta bu la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni
T02D1364:185a-45: kha cig ni grub pa'i dus su zhes smra ste /
T02D1364:185a-46: de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam bca' ma nyams par byed pa ste /
T02D1364:185a-47: rtog pa thams cad yongs spang ste //
T02D1364:185a-48: nyin zhag gcig la brtag par bya //
T02D1364:185b-0: zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan @185b 'das kyi bka' sun 'byin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1364:185b-1: grub pa'i dus su 'jig rten pa'i du ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1364:185b-2: sgyu ma la sogs pa gang yin pa de rtags su mi 'gyur te /
T02D1364:185b-5: sreg pa'i bya ba nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1364:185b-9: gser la sogs pa'i char gyis kyang ngo //
T02D1364:185b-10: de'i phyir yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor gyi rtags
T02D1364:185b-11: su du ba la sogs par 'gyur ba ni bcom
T02D1364:185b-13: de ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje dra ba'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1364:185b-14: yan lag drug bsgoms de nas ni //
T02D1364:185b-15: slar yang bdag byin brlab par bya //
T02D1364:185b-16: de nas go rims ji lta ba'i //
T02D1364:185b-17: chogs mtshan ma rtogs par bya //
T02D1364:185b-19: de la bdag byin gyis brlab pa ni kun rdzob kyi stong pa nyid mthong ba'o //
T02D1364:185b-20: so sor sdud pa'i mtshan ma ni sprin dang du ba la sogs pa lta bur snang ba ste /
T02D1364:185b-22: de nas sprin med pa'i nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i par du'o //
T02D1364:185b-23: rgyud gzhan rnams su dang po 'bar ba nas thig le mtha'i bar du ste /
T02D1364:185b-24: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u las kyang /
T02D1364:185b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1364:185b-26: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02D1364:185b-27: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02D1364:185b-28: 'od chen rnam par snang bar mdzad //
T02D1364:185b-29: ye shes snang ba lam me ba //
T02D1364:185b-30: 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron //
T02D1364:185b-31: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
T02D1364:185b-32: sngags drag mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal //
T02D1364:185b-33: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
T02D1364:185b-34: ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcas pa gnyis kyis sgyu
T02D1364:185b-35: 'phrul dra par rtags gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1364:185b-36: dgongs pa'i tshig gis gsungs so //
T02D1364:185b-37: sprin med pa'i nam mkha' las byung ba gang yin
T02D1364:185b-38: pa de ni nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba
T02D1364:185b-39: ste // rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1364:185b-40: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02D1364:185b-41: zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba ltar snang ba'o //
T02D1364:185b-42: 'od chen rnam par snang bar mdzad //
T02D1364:185b-43: ces bya ba ni zla ba ltar snang ba ste /
T02D1364:185b-44: de nyid kho nar ye shes snang ba lam me ba'o //
T02D1364:185b-45: 'gro ba'i mar me zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i snang ba'o //
T02D1364:185b-46: ye shes sgron zhes bya ba ni sga gcan ltar snang ba'o //
T02D1364:185b-47: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba ni glog ltar snang ba'o //
T02D1364:185b-48: sngags drag mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal //
T02D1364:186a-0: @186a * // zhes bya ba ni thig le ltar snang ba ste
T02D1364:186a-1: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog sngon po'i rnam pa'o
T02D1364:186a-2: // gsang sngags rgyal po don chen mdzad //
T02D1364:186a-3: ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi khams
T02D1364:186a-4: gsum gyi dngos po'i snang ba sgyu ma dang rmi
T02D1364:186a-5: lam dang mtshungs pa so sor sdud pa'i sbyor bas
T02D1364:186a-6: mthong ba'o // mig gi dbang po'i byed pa dang /
T02D1364:186a-7: de nas srog dang rtsol ba'i bcing ba ste /
T02D1364:186a-8: byed pa 'di rnams dang bcings pa'i sbyor bas sa gsum po ni bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1364:186a-11: gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1364:186a-12: de bzhin du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba las kyang /
T02D1364:186a-14: ji srid 'jig rten khams rnams dang //
T02D1364:186a-15: rdo rje'i lus ldan ji srid par //
T02D1364:186a-16: ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub //
T02D1364:186a-17: ces yan lag drug gis so zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'o //
T02D1364:186a-18: de bzhin du gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang /
T02D1364:186a-19: dngos po med cing sgom pa med //
T02D1364:186a-20: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
T02D1364:186a-21: de ltar dngos po dngos med pas //
T02D1364:186a-22: bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D1364:186a-24: 'dir dngos po med pa ni sprin med pa'i nam mkha'o //
T02D1364:186a-25: sgom pa ni so sor sdud pa'o //
T02D1364:186a-27: dngos po med pa bsgom pa min //
T02D1364:186a-29: 'dir so sor sdud pa'i bsgom pa'i yul ni sprin
T02D1364:186a-30: med pa'i nam mkha' yin pas bsgom pa yang yod
T02D1364:186a-32: rnam par rtog pa'i sgom pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1364:186a-33: de ltar dngos po ni so sor sdud pas mthong
T02D1364:186a-34: ba de yang dngos po ma yin te ma brtags
T02D1364:186a-36: ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dngos po rnams dngos po med par mthong ba'o //
T02D1364:186a-37: de nas so sor sdud pa bsgom pa'i phyir rnam
T02D1364:186a-38: par rtog pa bsgom pa mi dmigs so zhes bcom
T02D1364:186a-40: bsgom pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab
T02D1364:186a-41: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang 'di lta
T02D1364:186a-42: ste / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
T02D1364:186a-43: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
T02D1364:186a-44: ste / smras so // 'phags pa rab 'byor shes
T02D1364:186a-45: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba
T02D1364:186a-48: koo shi ka nam mkha' la sbyor bar 'dod pas
T02D1364:186a-49: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
T02D1364:186b-0: de bzhin du @186b phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa
T02D1364:186b-1: ni gzugs brnyan dang sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa dang
T02D1364:186b-2: / sprin med pa'i nam mkha' ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan to //
T02D1364:186b-3: de ltar so sor sdud pa dang /
T02D1364:186b-4: bsam gtan gyis bsnyen pa'i yan lag bstan to //
T02D1364:186b-5: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs dgongs pas rlung du bshad do //
T02D1364:186b-7: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D1364:186b-8: rin chen lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02D1364:186b-9: sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1364:186b-10: gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni //
T02D1364:186b-11: sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsgom //
T02D1364:186b-13: 'dir rin chen lnga'i sgras ni ra sa n'a la
T02D1364:186b-14: dkyil 'khor lnga'i chos can sa la sogs pa'i khams
T02D1364:186b-15: lnga'o // de'i bdag nyid kyi dbugs ni rin po che lnga'i rang bzhin sna bug g-yas pa la'o //
T02D1364:186b-16: de bzhin du sangs rgyas lnga ni la n'a la
T02D1364:186b-17: dkyil 'khor lnga'i chos can rnam par shes pa la
T02D1364:186b-18: sogs pa'i phung po lnga ste /
T02D1364:186b-19: de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa sna khung g-yon pa la'o //
T02D1364:186b-20: gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung ba ni 'dir gong bu'i
T02D1364:186b-21: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi srog
T02D1364:186b-22: gi rlung dbus ma aa ba dh'u t'ir gcig tu
T02D1364:186b-23: gyur pa'i // srog gi rlung de yang gong bu'i
T02D1364:186b-24: gzugs kyis phyung nas sna'i rtse mor sgom pa ste
T02D1364:186b-25: gyur pa'i // / de la sna'i rtso [*rtse?] mo'i sgras lte ba dang /
T02D1364:186b-29: gtsug tor gyi padma'i lte ba bstan te de'i rtse mor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1364:186b-30: sna'i rtse mor bsgom pa ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i dbus kyi padma'i lte bar ro //
T02D1364:186b-31: de ltar thig le'i gnas su gong bu'i tshul can
T02D1364:186b-32: srog 'dzin pas na de nyid 'dzin par bstan to
T02D1364:186b-33: // de bzhin du yan lag gnyis nye bar bsgrub pa ni bdud rtsi'i khyil pa'i gzugs te /
T02D1364:186b-34: nye bar bsgrub pa de nyid rdo rje bzlas par
T02D1364:186b-35: yang bstan te yan lag ma nyams pa'i bzlas pa
T02D1364:186b-36: ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rtsa la mi rgyu
T02D1364:186b-37: ba'o // gtsug tor gyi gzugs mthong nas /
T02D1364:186b-38: phyi nas sngags bas srog dang rtsol bal bya ba ste /
T02D1364:186b-39: bla ma'i man ngag dang dgongs pa'i tshig las rtogs
T02D1364:186b-40: par bya'o zhes bya ba ni srog dang rtsol ba
T02D1364:186b-41: dang 'dzin pa de'ang nye bar bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1364:186b-43: bsgrub pa la ni lha yi gzugs //
T02D1364:187a-0: 'dir 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis lte bar gnas pa'i tsanda @187a * //
T02D1364:187a-1: l'i 'bar bar rnal 'byor pas mthong ba ste /
T02D1364:187a-2: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral bas gzugs brnyan lta
T02D1364:187a-3: bu'i phyag rgya chen po 'bar zhing sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1364:187a-4: sprin mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin 'phro ba'i
T02D1364:187a-5: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par mdzes pa can
T02D1364:187a-6: te rjes su dran pas ni sgrub pa bstan to
T02D1364:187a-7: // 'dzin pa'i mthar tsanda l'i'i sbyor bsgom pa 'di ni nges pa'o //
T02D1364:187a-8: de nas de'i ye shes kyi 'od kyis phung po dang /
T02D1364:187a-9: khams dang skye mched rnams bsregs nas ro gcig par
T02D1364:187a-10: bya zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rtsa la gnas
T02D1364:187a-11: pa'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1364:187a-12: sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1364:187a-13: dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dang
T02D1364:187a-14: / de nas tsanda l'i'i ye shes kyi me'i 'od
T02D1364:187a-15: kyis zla ba zhu ba'i byang chub kyi sems thig
T02D1364:187a-16: le'i rnam pas 'og tu bab ste /
T02D1364:187a-20: gsang ba'i padmar dga' ba dang /
T02D1364:187a-22: sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba'i dang bzhin gyis /
T02D1364:187a-23: de nas rdo rje nor bu'i mthar lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid dam /
T02D1364:187a-24: yang na rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1364:187a-27: mtshan nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis te /
T02D1364:187a-28: de ltar bcu drug gi cha yongs su rdzogs shing
T02D1364:187a-29: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis nor bu'i nang du chud pa'i
T02D1364:187a-30: bde ba gang gi tshe 'byung ba de'i tshe tshig
T02D1364:187a-31: gi bde ba lta bu dpe tsam te /
T02D1364:187a-32: ngo bo nyid ni dbang po gnyis las byung ba'i
T02D1364:187a-33: 'jig rten pa'i bde ba des ni mchog tu mi
T02D1364:187a-34: 'jig pa'i bde ba'i bye ba phrag stong gi char
T02D1364:187a-36: 'dir mi 'jig pa'i bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1364:187a-37: dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi gnas skabs ni tshig gi
T02D1364:187a-38: yul ma yin pa byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1364:187a-39: kyis rnam par mi shes pa byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1364:187a-40: rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes
T02D1364:187a-41: bstan te / 'jig rten la grags pa'i med pa
T02D1364:187a-42: nyid kyi don du lhung bar byed pa ni ma
T02D1364:187a-44: de lta na yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor /
T02D1364:187a-47: bde bas rnal 'byor pa nyid sangs rgyas nyid de /
T02D1364:187a-48: dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed pa'i mchog rnal
T02D1364:187a-49: 'byor pas tshe 'di la bsgrub ces bsgrub par bya
T02D1364:187a-50: ba dang / sgrub pa'i nges pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan to //
T02D1364:187b-0: sbyor ba yan lag drug ces bya @187b ba gsang
T02D1364:187b-1: ba pa'i bdag po sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub
T02D1364:187b-2: sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1364:187b-4: / // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal rab
T02D1364:187b-5: 'byor zhi ba'i zhal snga nas lo ts'a ba cog
T02D1364:187b-6: ro dge slong ting 'dzin bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus
